L’aggiunta degli esercizi può essere eff: Adding exercises can be done on two platforms, on GitHub or via the exercise service.
Gli esercizi recuperabili da github poss: The exercises that can be recovered from github can only be recovered via the desktop application, while the exercises inserted on the exercise service can be recovered from all versions of the application, but require the “exercise service” microservice to be active.
Sia nel caso dell’aggiunta di esercizi s: Both in the case of adding exercises on the GitHub repository and adding exercises on the microservice, the rules to follow are identical, the only thing that changes is the place where the exercises reside.
Per aggiungere un nuovo esercizio recupe: To add a new exercise that can be recovered via github it is necessary to create a new repository, in which each exercise is associated with a folder, and in each folder there are 3 files, where the java files must have the same name as the exercise in question.

To add a new exercise that can be recovered via the Exercise Repository microservice, it is necessary to create a folder inside the ExerciseDB folder, in which each exercise is associated with a folder, and in each folder there are 3 files, where the java files must have the same name of the financial year in question.
